title: Rent EMI | Pay Rent & Deposit Monthly in the UAE | Rently
description: Rent EMI options in the UAE can be a lifesaver. Rently helps you secure your home now by paying your landlord upfront, so you can repay in easy monthly installments.
h1: Rent EMI: Pay Monthly for Rent & Deposits
paragraph: Struggling with upfront rental costs? Rently pays your annual rent and security deposit for you, letting you move in now and repay via simple rent EMI.

faqs.answer: Rently's Rent EMI service works by paying your annual rent upfront to your landlord while you repay in convenient monthly installments. After sharing your lease details and getting approved, Rently handles the full payment to your landlord, allowing you to move in immediately. You then make monthly payments to Rently which include a small service fee, creating a manageable payment schedule that aligns with your monthly income.
faqs.question: How does Rently's Rent EMI service work?

faqs.answer: Yes, your landlord receives the full annual rent payment upfront or in up to 6 cheques as per the lease agreement. This is the core benefit of Rently's service - landlords get their preferred payment structure while you gain the flexibility of monthly payments. The landlord experiences no difference from their standard rental collection process, which helps ensure they accept the arrangement. Your monthly payments are made to Rently, not directly to the landlord.
faqs.question: Does my landlord receive the full annual rent payment?

faqs.answer: Rently charges a small service fee that's included in your monthly payments. The exact fee is determined based on your specific rental situation and will be transparently communicated during the application process before you commit. This fee covers the convenience of converting your annual rent into manageable monthly installments and the upfront payment Rently makes to your landlord. There are no hidden costs or unexpected charges.
faqs.question: What service fee does Rently charge?

faqs.answer: Yes, Rently can also cover your security deposit and split it into manageable monthly installments along with your rent payments. This helps reduce the initial financial burden when securing a property. The full security deposit is paid to your landlord upfront, and you'll receive the deposit back from your landlord at the end of your lease term according to the standard terms in your rental agreement.
faqs.question: Can Rently help with my security deposit as well?

faqs.answer: Rently's Rent EMI service is available to tenants across the UAE rental market. The service is designed specifically to address the UAE's annual rent payment culture, helping tenants manage their finances more effectively. Rently works with various landlords and property management companies throughout the UAE, making the service accessible whether you're renting in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, or other emirates.
faqs.question: Is this service available throughout the UAE?
